participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas.
i love watching funny movies.
my two dogs are the best friends a girl could have.
I'm grateful for my health and the ability to work on my farm.
I filmed a documentary about a group of people who were following their dreams and it was an amazing experience.

participant_2.background:
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
I'm going to be practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir.
My biggest fear is not being able to overcome my eating disorder and being stuck in this cycle forever.
I'm not close with my family, but my friends are everything to me.
I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.

content.text: Hey! How's your day going so far?
Hey there! It's going good. Just finished a long day at work. What about you?
Same! I just got home from working on my farm. It was a long day but satisfying.
That's cool! I've always wanted to live on a farm. I love animals.
Me too! It's a lot of work but it's very rewarding. I love spending time with my animals.
What kind of animals do you have?
I have a couple of dogs, some chickens, and some pigs.
Aw! That sounds adorable! I've always wanted a dog, but I live in an apartment and I don't think my landlord would allow it.
Aww that's too bad. Dogs are the best!
Yeah, they really are. What do you do on your farm?
I mostly just raise animals and grow crops. I also do some filming and editing on the side.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to try filming something.
It's a lot of fun! I filmed a documentary about a group of people who were following their dreams and it was an amazing experience.
That sounds like it would be really interesting! I would love to see it if you ever release it.
I'll definitely let you know! It's still in the editing stages right now, but I'm hoping to have it finished soon.
Awesome! I can't wait to see it
